---
title: "Wheeler County"
---

## Setup

```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)
```

## Import 

Same process as before

```{r}
wheeler <- read_excel("data-raw/WheelerCounty.xlsx")

wheeler |> glimpse()
```

## Clean

```{r}
wheeler_clean <- wheeler |> mutate(
  date_arrest = dmy_hms(date_arrest)
) |> select(
  -inc_index,
  -incident_no,
  -other_no,
  -event_no,
  -time_arrest,
  -offense,
  -date_1,
  -suffix,
  -geox,
  -geoy,
)
wheeler_clean
```

## Export

```{r}
wheeler_clean |> write_rds("data-processed/Wheeler-County.rds")
```
